questions.question: Ms. Du said to the students, "Please greet me politely now."

choices.answer: Ms. Du told her students please greet her politely then.
Ms. Du said that they should greet her politely.
Ms. Du told the students to greet her politely then.
Ms. Du told the students to greet her politely.

questions.question: Ms. Yeung said, "Do not read the questions yet, class."

choices.answer: Ms. Yeung told the class not to read the questions yet.
Ms. Yeung told the students not reading the questions.
Ms. Yeung told the class do not read the questions.
Ms. Yeung said do not read the questions to the class.

questions.question: "We played in the park yesterday," said the kids.

choices.answer: The kids said they had played in the park the day before.
The kids said they played in the park yesterday.
The kids said they had played in park the day before.
The kids said they had played in the park the day before.

questions.question: "Don't stand too close here, Peter" Mom said.

choices.answer: Mom told Peter not to stand close here.
Mom told Peter not to stand close there.
Mom said not to stand close there.
Mom said that Peter should not stand close there.

questions.question: "Try your best in this test," said Ms. Du to 6G_E.

choices.answer: Ms. Du told 6G_E to try our best.
Ms. Du told 6G_E not to try their best.
Ms. Du told 6G_E to try their best.
Ms. Du told 6G_E try their best.

questions.question: "Study for your test, my beloved students," urged Ms. Du.

choices.answer: Ms. Du urged that the students should study for the test.
Ms. Du urged that we should study for our test.
Ms. Du urged her beloved students to study for their test.
Ms. Du urged us to study for our test.
